cards.rules_text:
Partner with Blazette, Blazing Blunder. [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Blazette into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
Flying, deathtouch
Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a 1/1 black Faerie rogue creature token with flying.
Whenever a Faerie or Nymph you control dies, draw a card.

Partner with Nyxpetal, Numbing Needle [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Nyxpetal into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
Flying, Haste
Whenever Blazette deals combat damage to a player, it deals 1 damage to each other creature.
Whenever a creature dealt noncombat damage by Blazette this turn dies, Blazette deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

Flying
Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
When this creature dies, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.

Flying, haste
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on other target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Sacrifice another creature: Target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if its toughness was less than {1}, Killwater Nymph deals 1 damage to up to one target creature.

Flying
Whenever you lose life, you may pay {R}. When you do, Pixie Swarmleader deals that much damage to target creature.
Whenever a Faerie or Nymph you control dies, Pixie Swarmleader deals 1 damage to target opponent.

Flying, menace
Other creatures you control with toughness 2 or less have menace.
{R}: Faeries and nymphs you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I'm a real crowd-pleaser! Especially when the crowd's on fire.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever another Faerie or Nymph you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Pixie's Pet Dragon.
Whenever one or more creatures you control die, Pixie's Pet Dragon deals that much damage to target opponent or creature.

Flying
Whenever Mishap Stalker enters or dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Prowl {B} [i](You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Faerie or Rogue.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Such fragile things you are. One little slip, and poof goes the mortal.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When this creature enters, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You won't see me coming, but you'll certainly feel me leaving.”[/i]

Flying
Wickedlace Pixie can't block
When Wickedlace Pixie enters, each player loses 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I hurt the ones I love. Everyone else? I do worse.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying, haste
Exile two other creature cards with flying from your graveyard: Return Decaying Deceiver from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Patience, sister. It needs a moment to... acclimate.” —Nyxpetal, Numbing Needle[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Vengeful Survivor dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control attached to target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Aww, sis, look at her, all determined and... smoldering. How sweet.” —Blazette, Blazing Blunder[/i]
cards.rules_text2: Enchanted creature has menace, deathtouch, and persist. [i](When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text2: [i]“Don't worry, she's not gone. Just a lot more clingy.” —Nyxpetal, Numbing Needle[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
If you would draw a card outside of your draw step, draw twice that many cards instead. You lose that much life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“They say laughter is the best medicine. I prefer coin... Lots and lots of coin.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that creature's controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Yes, Morrin, he's dead. No, you can't have his eyes.”[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]“They keep coming, and I keep sharing the love.”[/i]

When this creature enters, target opponent may have you draw two cards. If they don't, destroy target creature that player controls and you gain life equal to that creature's mana value.

Flying, haste
Xanthea can't block.

When this creature enters, you may return target Faerie or Nymph creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Haste
When Gloam Witch deals combat damage to an opponent, you may return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mana value less than or equal to Gloam Witch's power.
At the beginning of your end step, if you returned a creature card from the graveyard to the battlefield this turn, transform Gloam Witch.
cards.rules_text2:
Flying
When Soulbound Fey deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
At the beginning of your end step, if Soulbound Fey destroyed an opponent's creature through noncombat damage this turn, transform Soulbound Fey.

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, that player creates a 4/2 red Pirate creature token with “This token can't block.” The token is goaded for the rest of the game. [i](It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]

Flying, deathtouch
Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, look at the top card of that player's library, then exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap X untapped creatures you control.
Choose two — 
• Destroy up to X target artifacts.
• Target opponent loses X life and you gain X life.
• Return a creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
• Destroy each creature with mana value X or less.

Choose one —
• Burn Down the Farm deals 5 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
• Destroy all artifacts, then Burn Down the Farm deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of artifacts destroyed this way.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice target nontoken creature you control. Then, draw X cards where X is that creature's mana value. You lose X life.
